Spellguard Force Lash.name: Spellguard Force Lash
Spellguard Force Lash.flavor: Harnessing the shards of the mythal about you, you hurl them like razors against your foe and knock your enemy off its feet.
Spellguard Force Lash.trigger: A creature moves into any square within range
Spellguard Force Lash.onHit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is knocked prone.

Mythal Splinter.name: Mythal Splinter
Mythal Splinter.flavor: Your command of mythal energy allows you to twist reality and magic alike.
Mythal Splinter.effect: You create a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. No enemy in the zone can use a power that has the healing or teleportation keywords.

Mythal Spark.name: Mythal Spark
Mythal Spark.flavor: The raw power of the mythal resonates through you, creating a wave of silver light that tears into foes and quells their powers.
Mythal Spark.effect: Until the end of your next turn, targets cannot use powers that have the healing or teleportation keyword.
